HEADLINE: Please find attached our letter dated 07th November, 2022 on transcript of Earnings Conference Call of Q2 FY2022-23.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Regulation 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the transcript of Earnings Conference Call held on 1st August, 2022 in connection with the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 is available on the website of the Company and can be accessed on the website of the Company.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Regulation 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the transcript of UPL Capital
Markets Day 2022 held on 9th May, 2022 in connection with the audited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022 is
available on the website of the Company.
